name: Goop Gas Attack

historicalClassification.note: Originally printed as a Trainer. Would be classified as Item by modern rules.

effect.text: All Pok√©mon Powers stop working until the end of your opponent's next turn.
effect.duration: until end of opponent's next turn

tips: Use to shut down powerful Pokemon Powers like Damage Swap

competitiveHistory: Goop Gas Attack was a crucial answer to Pokemon Power-based strategies. It could temporarily shut down powerful abilities like Alakazam's Damage Swap or Blastoise's Rain Dance, giving non-Power decks a chance to compete. The artwork featured a gas-masked figure spraying toxic clouds.

rulings.ruling: All Pokemon Powers are affected, including your own.
The effect lasts until the end of your opponent's next turn, so Powers resume working at the start of your following turn.
Pokemon Powers that are already in effect (like continuous effects) are also shut down.
